name: Create a new post on a Facebook Page from a new topic in an Invision Community
description:
This template regularly checks for new forum topics in an Invision Community and uses the retrieved information from the first post to create a new post on your Facebook Page. 

The template is scheduled to run every hour. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking on the clock icon on the first module but you will also need to change the filter between the modules to reflect your new schedule otherwise you will end up with the same post being posted multiple times or no post being made at all.
